news.news:
Verion 2.0.0 alpha updates
Lupin now supports Time Spaced Repetition based on SM2 algorithm!!
 Import your flashcards directly from your github by running /tsr import ... you can then go over your pending flashcards using /tsr x where x is the number of cards you'd like to see. If you don't specify x the value set in your config.ini will be used.
Also Lupin can now pull these news updates after each significatif update. This will keep you posted about the latest news.

 This version requires new values in your config.ini file

Verion 3.0.0 experimental updates
 A new version upgrade introducing MinMap capabilties among other thing. Send /getMM pageTitle and Lupin will generate a Markmap file containing a mindmap of that page and send it to you. 
Credits to https://markmap.js.org/
 /tsr command is now renamed to /srs

Verion 3.1.0 experimental updates
 Thanks to @Piotr 3 months calendar can now be autogenerated and inserted in your right side-bar. Version releases also a new command /pullnow that forces refresh from GitHub & a scheduled pull that can be configured from the config.ini `GitHubUpdateFrequency` 

Version requires new values in your config.ini file, please reffer to config.sample.ini
